com.rath.rathbot.msg

Class MessageHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rath.rathbot.msg.MessageHelper

  • public class MessageHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains frequently-used message formatting methods.
    Author:
    Tim Backus tbackus127@gmail.com

    • Method Detail

      • buildCmdDescrMsg

        public static final java.lang.String buildCmdDescrMsg(java.lang.String header,
                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,RBCommand> commands)
        Builds a message with commands and their descriptions.
        Parameters:
        header - the line before the commands list.
        commands - a map of Strings to RBCommands.
        Returns:
        the built message as a String.

      • concatenateTokens

        public static final java.lang.String concatenateTokens(java.lang.String[] tokens,
                                                       int startIndex)
        Squishes a String array's contents to a single String starting at and including the given starting point, with the contents of each index being separated by a single space.
        Parameters:
        tokens - the String array to squish.
        startIndex - the index to start squishing at.
        Returns:
        a single String.

      • buildListString

        public static final java.lang.String buildListString(java.lang.String header,
                                                     java.util.List<?> list,
                                                     boolean breakLines)
        Builds a String from a header and list of entries with the option to break lines between each.
        Parameters:
        header - the header for the list, includes a line break.
        list - the entries as a List of whatevers. The object's toString() method will be called.
        breakLines - true if each list entry will be on a separate line; false if they are comma-separated.
        Returns:
        the built String.

      • buildDiscNotificationMessage

        public static java.lang.String buildDiscNotificationMessage(PunishmentType type,
                                                            int time,
                                                            java.lang.String reason)
        Builds a notification message for an infraction, delivered to the user in a direct message.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of punishment (warn, ban, etc.).
        time - the amount of time the user stays muted, in seconds. if the user isn't to be muted, this parameter is ignored.
        reason - the reason the user was banned, as a String.
        Returns:
        the message that will be sent as a String.
